mapper.select: SELECT A.CATEGORY_NO AS MAIN_CATE_NO, A.CATEGORY_NAME AS MAIN_CATE_NAME, B.CATEGORY_NO AS SUB_CATE_NO, B.CATEGORY_NAME AS SUB_CATE_NAME FROM CATEGORY A JOIN CATEGORY B ON A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_PRENO

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(P PK_PRODUCTNO) */ ROWNUM rn, T.* FROM ( SELECT B.*, A.AVG_STAR, REVIEW_CNT FROM ( SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, NVL2(TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),0.0) AS AVG_STAR, COUNT(STAR_CNT) AS REVIEW_CNT FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN REVIEW D ON P.PRODUCT_NO = D.PRODUCT_NO GROUP BY P.PRODUCT_NO ) A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO ) T WHERE T.PET_TYPE = #{type} AND T.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' ) A
WHERE RN > (#{page}-1) * 8 AND RN <= (#{page}) * 8
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(P PK_PRODUCTNO) */ ROWNUM rn, T.* FROM ( SELECT B.*, A.AVG_STAR, REVIEW_CNT FROM ( SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, NVL2(TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),0.0) AS AVG_STAR, COUNT(STAR_CNT) AS REVIEW_CNT FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN REVIEW D ON P.PRODUCT_NO = D.PRODUCT_NO GROUP BY P.PRODUCT_NO ) A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO ) T WHERE T.PET_TYPE = #{type} AND T.CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} ) A WHERE RN > (#{page}-1) * 8 AND RN <= (#{page}) * 8
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM PRODUCT WHERE PET_TYPE = #{type} AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT A.CART_NO AS CART_NO, C.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, C.PRODUCT_PRICE AS PRODUCT_PRICE, A.SELECT_CNT AS SEL_CNT, A.PRODUCT_NO AS PRODUCT_NO FROM MY_CART A JOIN USER_TBL B ON A.MEMBER_NO = B.USER_NO JOIN PRODUCT C ON A.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO WHERE B.USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO IN
#{arr}

SELECT B.*, AVG_STAR, REVIEW_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO, NVL2(TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),0.0) AS AVG_STAR, COUNT(STAR_CNT) AS REVIEW_CNT FROM PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN REVIEW B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE PET_TYPE = #{petType} GROUP BY A.PRODUCT_NO, A.PRODUCT_REGIST_DATE ORDER BY A.PRODUCT_REGIST_DATE DESC ) A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT B.*, AVG_STAR, REVIEW_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO, COUNT(*) AS CNT, NVL2(TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),0.0) AS AVG_STAR, COUNT(STAR_CNT) AS REVIEW_CNT FROM PRODUCT A JOIN REVIEW B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE A.PET_TYPE = #{petType} GROUP BY A.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY CNT DESC ) A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT B.*, AVG_STAR, REVIEW_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO, NVL2(TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),0.0) AS AVG_STAR, COUNT(STAR_CNT) AS REVIEW_CNT FROM PRODUCT A JOIN REVIEW B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE A.PET_TYPE = #{petType} GROUP BY A.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY AVG(B.STAR_CNT) DESC ) A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
mapper.update: update product set product_stock = product_stock-#{cnt} where product_no = #{productNo}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.REVIEW_NO FROM ( SELECT A.MER_UID, B.PRODUCT_NAME,B.PRODUCT_PRICE, COUNT(*) AS BUY_CNT, B.PRODUCT_NO, A.ORDER_DATE FROM product_order A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE A.USER_NO = #{userNo} GROUP BY A.MER_UID, B.PRODUCT_NAME, B.PRODUCT_NO, A.ORDER_DATE, B.PRODUCT_PRICE ORDER BY A.ORDER_DATE DESC ) A LEFT JOIN REVIEW B ON A.MER_UID = B.MER_UID AND A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY A.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT B.*, NVL2(AVG_STAR, AVG_STAR, 0.0) AS AVG_STAR, REVIEW_CNT FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO , TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1) AS AVG_STAR, COUNT(STAR_CNT) AS REVIEW_CNT FROM REVIEW GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO ) A RIGHT JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE B.PET_TYPE = #{petType} ORDER BY B.PRODUCT_REGIST_DATE

SELECT B.*, AVG_STAR, REVIEW_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO,NVL2(TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),0.0) AS AVG_STAR, CNT, COUNT(STAR_CNT) AS REVIEW_CNT FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM PRODUCT_ORDER GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO ) A LEFT JOIN REVIEW B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO GROUP BY A.PRODUCT_NO, CNT ) A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE B.PET_TYPE = #{petType} ORDER BY CNT DESC

SELECT B.*, AVG_STAR, REVIEW_CNT FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO, NVL2(TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),TRUNC(AVG(STAR_CNT),1),0.0) AS AVG_STAR, COUNT(STAR_CNT) AS REVIEW_CNT FROM REVIEW GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO ) A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE B.PET_TYPE = #{petType} ORDER BY AVG_STAR DESC
